Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: equity activity related to stock based awards
payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from borrowings to fund acquisition
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds and excess tax benefit from sharebased compensation
proceeds from exercise and excess tax benefit related to stock based awards
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments to acquire other productive assets
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued interest receivable net
increase decrease in operating lease right of use assets and liabilities net
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets and liabilities net
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
net payments collections short term accounts receivable
net change in client fund obligations
net change in funds held for clients money market securities and other cash equivalents
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic
Other Non-Cash Items: accretion amortization of discounts and premiums investments
availableforsale securities gross realized gain loss excluding other than temporary impairments
debt securities available for sale realized gain loss
gain loss on disposition of assets
premiums paid on cash flow hedges
